title: Leadership Practice Competency Enhancement: Adaptive Control Strategy-Based Education for Coordinate Concept Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational understanding of mathematics and linguistic structures
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Learners can accurately explain the fundamental concepts of coordinate systems in three-dimensional space.
Learners can comparatively analyze learning efficiency based on simultaneous/sequential concept presentation methods with ≥85% accuracy.
Learners can solve coordinate transformation problems at ≥90% accuracy by adapting to individual learning progress through adaptive control strategies.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
